meanings.definition: Relating to a period of 2000 years.
meanings.sent1: The bimillennial celebration marked the passing of two millennia.
meanings.sent2: The ancient artifact was dated to a bimillennial era.
meanings.sent3: The bimillennial clock seemed to tick slower than usual.
meanings.sent4: The bimillennial prophecy foretold a great awakening after centuries.
meanings.sent5: The bimillennial event was etched in history for generations to come.

meanings.sent3: The bimillennial reunion was a chance for old friends to reconnect.
meanings.sent4: The bimillennial flood was a reminder of nature's power over time.
meanings.sent5: The bimillennial tradition was upheld with great pomp and ceremony.
